thread.title: Local restaurant lands on 'Best Cheap Eats in Every State' list
thread.title_full: Local restaurant lands on 'Best Cheap Eats in Every State' list

author: Leslie Collins
title: Local restaurant lands on 'Best Cheap Eats in Every State' list
text: Local restaurant lands on 'Best Cheap Eats in Every State' list Feb 23, 2017, 8:07am CST Industries & Tags Leslie Collins Reporter Kansas City Business Journal Share Leslie Collins Reporter Kansas City Business Journal Bizspace Spotlight El Pollo Rey stands out among the pack when it comes to flavorful food at a reasonable… more iStock (J-Roman) One local restaurant stands out among the pack when it comes to flavorful food at a reasonable price. To find the "Best Cheap Eats in Every State," Travel + Leisure magazine turned to food expert Ali Khan , who hosts the Cooking Channel series "Cheap Eats." El Pollo Rey stands out among the pack when it comes to flavorful food at a reasonable… more iStock (J-Roman) In Kansas, El Pollo Rey took the top spot. The Kansas City, Kan., Mexican restaurant at 901 Kansas Ave. specializes in chicken dishes, and its spatchcocking technique creates a "flavorful punch that pairs delectably with the rice and beans it comes with," according to T ravel + Leisure. Its half chicken platter costs $6.75, and its full chicken platter feeds the entire family at $12.50. El Pollo ranks high on Yelp, and one reviewer called the restaurant an "awesome hidden jewel of authentic ethnic food." In Missouri, St. Louis' burger joint Carl's Drive-In claimed the No. 1 spot. Leslie covers entrepreneurs and technology, retail, and marketing. Bizspace Spotlight
